section.title: The StorageInfoQuotaObserver cell
section.para: The StorageInfoQuotaObserver keeps track on spaces for all attached pools. The space granularity is based on the StorageInfo. It records precious, total, pinned, free and removable spaces of currently available pools. Pools, not active are not counted. Spaces may be queried by pool, storageinfo or link. For link queries, additional, link specific information is provided for convenience.

section.title: Calling Sequence
section.programlisting: # define context QuotaManagerSetup endDefine set pool query interval 180 set pool query steps 20 set pool query break 200 set poolmanager query interval 350 set pool validity timeout 400 endDefine # create diskCacheV111.services.space.StorageInfoQuotaObserver QuotaManager \ "default -export" #

blockquote.para: These commands allow to customize the behaviour of the StorageInfoQuotaObserver. They many determine how offen information is updated and how agressive the cells queries other services for updates. The meaning of the set pool/poolmanager query interval is obvious. Because of the fact, that the number of pools to query can be rather large, the cell allows to send the space update queries in junks with some time inbetween. The junk size is set by set pool query steps and the break between sending junks by set pool query break. If no pool information arrived within the set pool validity timeout the corresponding pool is declared OFFLINE and the spaces are no longer counted.

listitem.para: show link [-a] Lists spaces per link. The -a option provides additional information, eg. the storage classes and pools assigned to the particular link.
show sci Lists spaces per storage element.

section.title: Messages
section.para: This cells currently replies on the following cell messages.

blockquote.para: The StorageInfoQuotaCell provides a list of PoolLinkInfo structures, one per known link, on arrival of the message. Each PoolLinkInfo is filled with the name of the link, the list of storage classes, this link is associtated to, and the totally available space, left in this link. OFFLINE pools are not counted.
StorageInfoQuotaCell provides the soft and hard quota defined for the specified StorageClass together with the space used.
